desc_cleancity_1: CleanCity is a city cleanliness reporting platform that helps residents and campus communities report cleanliness issues quickly and in a structured way.
desc_cleancity_2: Through CleanCity, users can report garbage piles, bad odors, full collection points, or other cleanliness issues so that related parties can respond more efficiently.
desc_cleancity_3: This project aligns with SDG 11 (Sustainable Cities & Communities), supporting the creation of cleaner, safer, and more sustainable urban environments.
sdg11_desc: By simplifying the reporting of cleanliness issues such as garbage piles, bad odors, or full collection points, CleanCity helps create safer, more comfortable, and more sustainable cities and campus communities.
